name: Trench Hell
description:
Trench Hell is a game where you fight to survive an alternate version of the great war. This game is not easy and will not hold your hand.

Current version: 0.1.Bierce

Controls:

WASD: walk
shift: run
G: check ammo
R: load 1 round
left mb: fire
right mb: cycle bolt
middle mb: aim
add remove ammo when checking ammo with numpad + -
